sentences.sContent: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.sContent_eng: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.sCn: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.sContent: Secondly,put some tomato paste on the bread.
sentences.sContent_eng: Secondly,put some tomato paste on the bread.
sentences.sCn: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.sContent: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.sContent_eng: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.sCn: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

phrases.pCn: 番茄酱，蕃茄汁；番茄沙司
蕃茄酱，西红柿酱；蕃茄糊

remMethod.val: 西红柿(tomato)和土豆(potato)的味道可差远了

trans.tranOther: a round soft red fruit eaten raw or cooked as a vegetable
